resources.string: Your assistant is ready!\nTap on button below to start recognition.
Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
Please enter required details and try saving again.
NLU data source changed. Please restart app for the changes to take effect.

This application currently supports Aimybox and RASA as NLU source. By default application uses it's own Aimybox source.

You can select your own Aimybox source by entering an API key or select custom RASA source and enter the webhook API URL. Tap on edit icon to do the changes. Changes will be applied after application restarts.

For more details you can see the full application source code at: https://github.com/sumitsahoo/RASA-With-Aimybox
